How It Works

ğŸ“

1. Write a .conf

Names, message, theme, music â€” all in a simple INI file.

ğŸ”€

2. Open a PR

Add your letter to public/letters/. Auto-deploys on merge.

ğŸ’•

3. Share the link

Get a unique URL. Share via Twitter, WhatsApp, text, anywhere.

Quick Start

Minimal letter 

[card]
from = Your Name
to = Their Name
message = "I love you"

[finale]
message = "Forever Yours"

Then 

$ openssl rand -hex 2
a3f8

$ cp letter.conf public/letters/name-a3f8.conf
$ git add . && git commit && git push
$ # open a PR â†’ auto-deploys!
